title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: I am setting up a small local exchange and need a Tron Script developper for multisig Tron addresses, where to find a good one ?

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.created_time: July 21, 2022, 09:45:59 AMLast edit: July 21, 2022, 10:06:15 AM by Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: codehtcmail on July 21, 2022, 08:58:01 AMI am setting up a small local exchange and need a Tron Script developper for multisig Tron addresses, where to find a good one ?Maybe you can post it here:Project DevelopmentServicesBut just be careful though, maybe you will received a lot of PM's specially from newbies. My advise is to filter everyone out before you hire someone to work and be sure they all have the background otherwise you might get someone very cheap but the product might not be good. Best of luck!!!

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Just to add up from the post above. If you pay in bitcoins it surely the way go. But if you are going to pay using altcoins, the Marketplace (Altcoins) board is should suffice.Another option would be to go to: https://www.reddit.com/r/Jobs4Bitcoins/. Beforehand, if you might want to discuss or want to find a reference and some network about the job/services, you may want to chime around within a Service Discussion board.
